meanings.definition: A type of resin obtained from the mastic tree.
meanings.sent1: The mastic resin was used to make fragrant perfumes.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used mastics to seal the gaps in the wooden floor.
meanings.sent3: The mastic resin decided to take a break from being sticky all the time.

meanings.sent4: His words acted as mastics, bringing the team closer together.
meanings.sent5: The mastic adhesive formed a strong bond between the two surfaces.
